about_the_game:
It is the future; humans have the ability to navigate through space and conquer planets using cloning technology. At some point in history, humankind disappeared, leaving everything behind: houses, factories, and planets. By chance or fate, one of the abandoned cloning factories starts running again, creating an army of clones with the preconfigured objective of conquering the next planet. However, Death Pilot does not begin at the outset of this conquest. Instead, it unfolds many years into the future, when the cloning factory is no longer in optimal condition because there is nobody around to maintain it. Rather than producing an army of clones, the cloning factory now creates just one clone over the course of years. And that clone is you.

Explore the planet

Embark on a journey across the planet to uncover clues about your past clones. Will anyone be left alive?

Defend yourself

The planet is not empty; prepare to eradicate whatever killed your previous clones. Utilize the weapon you carry with you. Will it be sufficient for the task?

Follow the orders

Your suit is equipped with artificial intelligence that guides you towards your only goal: to conquer the planet. Will it make sense to pursue this goal, or will you find a new one?

It is the future; humans have the ability to navigate through space and conquer planets using cloning technology. At some point in history, humankind disappeared, leaving everything behind: houses, factories, and planets. By chance or fate, one of the abandoned cloning factories starts running again, creating an army of clones with the preconfigured objective of conquering the next planet. Rather than producing an army of clones, the cloning factory now creates just one clone over the course of years. And that clone is you.

name: Death Pilot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5-8600k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in the mind of a lone clone, created by an abandoned factory with an inexplicable mission: conquer a desolate planet. Uncover the mystery of your existence as you explore a world littered with the remains of failed clones, questioning your purpose and sanity.
